/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their architecture hinting at the urban landscape of the city. Cars and buses fill the road, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. The sun casts a bright light over the scene, illuminating the buildings and casting shadows that add depth to the image. The colors are vibrant, with the blue of the sky contrasting with the various hues of the buildings and vehicles.
